title: Logarithmic vector fields and foliations on toric varieties
authors: Daniele Faenzi (IMB), Marcos Jardim (IMECC), William D Montoya (IMECC)
abstract:
We introduce a toric version of the sheaf of logarithmic vector fields along
a divisor of a simplicial toric variety. The notion is also relevant for
algebraically independent families of polynomials in the Cox ring. We provide a
generalisation of the Saito criterion for the freeness of the toric logarithmic
sheaf. We explain the relationship between this sheaf and the usual sheaf of
logarithmic vector fields and the connection with holomorphic foliations on
toric varieties.
